Title: Permits only one traffic infraction per traffic stop for having tinted windows on a motor vehicle
Summary: Permits only one traffic infraction per traffic stop for having tinted windows on a motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting only one traffic infraction per traffic stop for having tinted windows on a motor vehicle
